title: Mules and Men - speaker employs metaphor

content.question: In the second paragraph, the speaker employs the metaphor of a close-fitting garment to express

choices.label: her struggle to learn about anthropology in college
the difficulty of viewing her cultural heritage objectively
her impression of imagery typical in stories of Brer Rabbit and the Squinch Owl
the experience of attending a college far away from her native surroundings

content.answer: the difficulty of viewing her cultural heritage objectively

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
